testcase.classname: add a new pet to the store
testcase.name: Try to add a new pet to the store with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user has status and name..............................................passed And the photo urls of "jhk" pet.............................................passed When user send post request with these valid data...........................passed Then the pet added with name "Dog"..........................................passed And status code is "200"....................................................passed

testcase.name: User try to find pets based on status
testcase.system-out: Given User wants to find pet within "available".............................passed When Sends get request to pet endpoint with the status as query parameter...passed Then status code is "200"...................................................passed

testcase.name: User try to find pets based on status 2
testcase.system-out: Given User wants to find pet within "pending"...............................passed When Sends get request to pet endpoint with the status as query parameter...passed Then status code is "200"...................................................passed

testcase.name: User try to find pets based on status 3
testcase.system-out: Given User wants to find pet within "sold"..................................passed When Sends get request to pet endpoint with the status as query parameter...passed Then status code is "200"...................................................passed

testcase.name: Try to delete a created order
testcase.system-out: Given user has valid data to store a pet....................................passed And send a post request with the valid body.................................passed And status code is "200"....................................................passed When user sends a delete request to the system with the valid OrderId witch has been created.passed Then status code is "200"...................................................passed

testcase.classname: place an order for a pet
testcase.name: User try place an order for a pet with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user has valid data to store a pet....................................passed When send a post request with the valid body................................passed Then status code is "200"...................................................passed And the order has been stored successfully with status "placed".............passed

testcase.name: try to create a new user with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given Admin has valid data to create a new user.............................passed When Admin send post request to create user.................................passed Then status code is "200"...................................................passed And response body matches "json-schemas/createUser.json" in Api contract....passed

testcase.classname: User logs into to the system
testcase.name: User try to logs in with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User has a valid userName and password................................passed When user sends a get request to the system with the valid credentials......passed Then status code is "200"...................................................passed
